pages.text: O vi kred vi evit any suspicion ecx a malpli mord de suspicion est sinful. Vi ne spion 1 another nor shall vi backbite 1 another this est as abominable as mangx karn your dead frat! Vi certainly abhor this. Vi observ DI. DI est Redeemer Merciful
O popol ni kre vi sam vir female rendered vi distinct popol gent ke vi recognize unu another Bon among vi en sight DI est plej righteous. DI est Omniscient Cognizant

Arabs dir Ni est Mu'mens (believers.) Dir Vi ne kred; ki vi dir est â€˜Ni est Muslims (submitters) ' belief establ your kor. vi obe DI His messenger Li ne put any da your works waste DI est Forgiver Merciful
Mu'mens (believers) est those kred en DI His messenger tiam ating status hav ne dub whatsoever strive their mon their viv en ig DI! These est truthful unu
Dir vi inform DI your religi? DI kon CXIO EN heavens TER. DI est Omniscient
